# Test: grove list shows no sync indicator when no upstream is configured
setup_workspace feature/test

exec grove add feature/test
# feature-test has no upstream configured
exec grove list --plain
stdout 'feature-test.*\[feature/test\]'
! stdout 'feature-test.*\+[0-9]'
! stdout 'feature-test.*\-[0-9]'
! stdout 'feature-test.*gone'
stderr 'Gathering worktree status'
